name: SquashCrew
description:
Controls:

Move LeftA / Left ArrowLeft JoystickMove RightD / Right ArrowRight JoystickJumpW / Up Arrow / SpaceButton 1 / 2ShootE / Q / Shift / Numpad 0Large Shoulder ButtonsDrop WeaponS / Down ArrowTop Shoulder Buttons

Goal: Be at the center rectangle capture point alone until it fills up with your color!

This game is a submission for the PB Game Jam 5, and is also my first game jam ever! And on top of that, the first game I actually kind of brought to a semi-finished state. Hooray!

If anyone cares about the game at all, I'll surely add a title screen, the ability to play with your friends locally (which i think would be loads of fun), more weapons and maps etc. Hope you enjoy!
